tool_description: AdVerifai - automatically get news quality score and insights with FakeRank
title: AdVerifai-es

api_list.name: malware_check
api_list.description: Check if a site is unsafe due to Malware

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: url of a site to check

api_list.name: imposter_check
api_list.description: Check if a twitter account is impersonating a known news brand. E.g. https://twitter.com/ESPNUFC

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: url of a twitter account to check

api_list.name: fact_check
api_list.description: Get references to a story from fact checking archives. The references can be used to flag stories that were already debunked by fact checking sites

required_parameters.name: headline
required_parameters.description: Headline of a story to check

api_list.name: source_check
api_list.description: Check if a website is purveyor of fake news, satire, political bias, etc. Returns further information about the site or empty if it's not suspect.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: url of a site to check

api_list.name: sensitive_check
api_list.description: Check if a story contains sensitive content such as violence or offensive language

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: url of a story to check
